full_text:
Ok. Let's check in at noon. You can call my cell or send a call in number for the three of use. Either way works

On Aug 11, 2019, at 9:31 AM, Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote:

Sure. Noon is fine, nothing pressing but we can talk anytime you want.

Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

-------- Original message --------
From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (OAG) (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 8/11/19 9:29 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death

>>> (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (OAG) 08/11/2019 09:29 >>>
Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG?

Does 12 noon work?  If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier.

(b)(6)
(b)(7)(C)

On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote:

How do they have this info? Unbelieveable.

https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/

Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

Page 2305
DOJ-OGR-00024318

Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

-------- Original message -------- From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (OAG) (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> Date: 8/11/19 9:29 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death

>>> (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (OAG) 08/11/2019 09:29 >>> Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG? Does 12 noon work?  If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier.
On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelieveable.
Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email correspondence related to Jeffrey Epstein's death. The redactions are indicated by (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), suggesting that the information is protected under the Freedom of Information Act.
